dt-option.name: searchPanes.filterChanged()
dt-option.summary: Function normally used to update titles text when a new selection is made.

type.parameter: number representing the number of options that have been selected in SearchPanes.
type.description: This function is called every time the number of SearchPanes options that have been selected changes. As default it updates the title within the SearchPanes container so that up to date information is displayed there.

dt-option.description:
This function is called every time the number of SearchPanes options that have been selected changes. As default this is used to update the SearchPanes title (set using the `-init language.searchPanes.title` config option alongside an `-api i18n()` api call).
The SearchPanes button also uses this configuration option to update the button text to reflect the selection numbers (text is set using `-init language.searchPanes.collapse` and an `-api i18n()` api call).
The context of the function is the DataTables instance, meaning that API methods can be called directly from within the function. For example...
``` this.i18n(...); ```
This function could of course be used to perform other functionality, although this is down to the user requirements.
